member.name: T:CoreExtensions.Conversions.CastX
member.summary: Provides all major extensions to cast objects.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.CastX.DynamicCast(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Special dynamic memory allocated casting function. Attempts to cast memory to any type specified.
member.returns: Dynamically allocated object of type specified, if fails, returns null.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.CastX.MemoryCast(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Fast way to cast memory of one object to another. Does not guarantee to return exact copy.
member.param: Object to be casted memory into.
Object to be casted memory from.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.CastX.ReinterpretCast(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Casts any type passed to any primitive type specified.
member.param: Primitive type to be converted to.
member.returns: Casted value of the passed object.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.CastX.StaticCast``1(System.IConvertible)
member.summary: Casts any object to any type specified. Throws exception in case cast fails.
member.returns: Casted value of type specified. If casting fails, exception will be thrown.

member.name: T:CoreExtensions.Conversions.FormatX
member.summary: Provides extension for reverse formatting of the strings.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.FormatX.GetFormattedString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns substring of a value from a specified format. Example: if value = "Array[100]" and format = "Array[{X}]", this returns (string)"100".

Format to which parse the string and return the value.
member.returns: String got from format of the value passed.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.Conversions.FormatX.GetFormattedValue``1(System.String,System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Returns value of type from a specified format. Example: if value = "Array[100]", format = "Array[{X}]", and type if 4-byte integer, this returns (int)100.
member.param: String from which to get format
Format to which parse the string and return the value.
member.returns: Value got from format of the string passed.

member.name: T:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader
member.summary: Reads primitive data types as binary values in a specific encoding using big-endian methods.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and using UTF-8 encoding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and using UTF-8 encoding.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and character encoding, and optionally leaves the stream open.
member.param: true to leave the stream open after the object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt16
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte signed integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A 2-byte signed integer read from the current stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt16
member.summary: Reads a 2-byte unsigned integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by two bytes.
member.returns: A 2-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt32
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte signed integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte signed integer read from the current stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt32
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte unsigned integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadInt64
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte signed integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte signed integer read from this stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadUInt64
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte unsigned integer from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte unsigned integer read from this stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadSingle
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte floating point value from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by four bytes.
member.returns: A 4-byte floating point value read from the current stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadDouble
member.summary: Reads an 8-byte floating point value from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by eight bytes.
member.returns: An 8-byte floating point value read from the current stream.

member.name: M:CoreExtensions.IO.BigEndianBinaryReader.ReadDecimal
member.summary: Reads an decimal value from the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the position of the stream by sixteen bytes.
member.returns: A decimal value read from the current stream.

member.summary: Writes an eight-byte floating-point value to the current stream using big-endian encoding and advances the stream position by eight bytes.

member.returns: A byte array containing data read from the underlying stream. This might be less than the number of bytes requested if the end of the stream is reached.
